flow_description: First - Take in 2 numbers and multiply them, Second - divide them by the largest prime number below 20 and Third - convert the result to binary and hex

agents.head: True
agents.what_should_agent_do: Take in 3 and 4, Return only the multiplication result number. Nothing else

agents.head: False
agents.what_should_agent_do: Take this number, divide it by the largest prime number below 20 and return only the Remainder result number. No other text.

agents.head: False
agents.what_should_agent_do: Take this number, convert it to binary and return just the result number. No other text

agents.head: False
agents.what_should_agent_do: Take this binary number, convert it to hexadecimal and return just the result number. No other text
